items.text: full on leg stump, and he misses the flick. Hits his front leg, but the lbw appeal is turned down. Probably because it would've definitely gone down leg stump
items.shortText: Holder to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.preText: Final Powerplay starting. Looks like Keemo Paul will start the 41st.
items.text: back of a hand slower ball, full on off. Defended
full on middle, and he misses the nudge to the leg side. Hits his pad, but looks like it was bat-pad, and that saves him from being out lbw
yorker just outside off, and it's right in the blockhole. Mahmudullah can't get bat to ball, and the delivery goes into the keeper's gloves
slower ball, but a full toss on middle. Nudged to deep backward square
full on off, and he drills a drive over the bowler's head to long off
full just outside off, and he drives with the angled bat. But finds the fielder at cover. Just two off Keemo's return over
slower ball, but full on middle. Mashrafe backs away to the leg side, and then swats a straight drive for four
items.shortText: Holder to Mashrafe Mortaza, FOUR runs

items.text: full just outside leg stump, and he makes room once again before drilling an inside-out drive through cover. Man in the deep, but he can't cut it off in time
items.shortText: Holder to Mashrafe Mortaza, FOUR runs

items.text: slower ball on middle, and Mashrafe lifts this over Holder! Off the bat's toe end, but enough behind it to beat mid off. A hat-trick of fours
items.shortText: Holder to Mashrafe Mortaza, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length on middle, but that's one too many. Swipes at this, and the ball is mistimed over short fine leg
back of a length on middle again, but Mortaza makes room and pulls to Cottrell at deep midwicket. Fifteen off the over already
knee-high full toss on middle, and he tickles this square to deep midwicket to keep the strike

items.preText: Ten per over will take Bangladesh to 303
items.text: full outside off, and he laces this drive through the covers. But well stopped by cover
slower ball, but wide and full outside off. Forces Mortaza to reach at it, and he mistimes a shot to cover
items.shortText: Paul to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: full outside off, and he tries to slog a shot down the ground. Places this past Paul's left
full outside off, and he slashes hard at this. Slices a drive, but the ball goes over gully for four!

items.preText: third man goes back. Deep square leg comes in
items.text: yorker just outside off, and he runs it down to third man for one
short and wide outside off, and he flat-bats a pull down the ground. Nicks the non-striker's stumps on the way to long on

improvisation! Mortaza goes really deep into his crease to try and earn a few extra seconds, and Holder bowls full outside off. Swings through the ball's line, and has enough behind his shot to beat long on!
items.shortText: Holder to Mashrafe Mortaza, SIX runs

items.text: back of a length outside off, and Mashrafe tries to pull it fine down the leg side. Connects well, but finds the fielder at short fine leg
items.shortText: Holder to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: back of a length on leg stump, and Mashrafe backs away to flat-bat a pull to wide long on
slower ball but short on middle stump. Goes over Mahmudullah's head, but the umpire says that's not a wide
full on leg, and he clips it away to deep fine leg for one
what was that?! Short ball on middle, and Mahmudullah tries to reverse-pull (yes, you read that right). He's tangled up, but manages to top-edge the shot to the keeper. Dropped though!
